title: i being looking for apartment on craiglists
description:
EV charging cats are OK - purrr dogs are OK - wooof furnished apartment no smoking wheelchair accessible this is the answer people sent me
is this a scam??
Hello,

Thank you very much for taking your time to email me. l want you to know that the property you are writing me about is still available for move in but before we proceed any further l want you to know that the kind of tenant l am looking forward to have,clean,quiet,respectful and responsible someone that will treat the house with care and respect. l don’t need the partying type but if you can assure me of the safety of the house if i decided to accept you as my new tenant l will be happy to let you rent from me for as long as you wish.I want you to know am on the missionary assignment here with me and my family to United State .
The house is located in a safe and secured neighborhood which i think it is the most important thing for one to know before relocating. You are free to drive or walk by so you can tour the exterior of the building if you wish. Me and my wife decided to handle the rental process ourselves due to our past experience with estate agents and tenant because all they care about is their own commission instead of taking time to verify applicants application and do a proper background check, the last tenant that rented from us through an estate agent destroyed most of our valuable home appliances. I know how much me and my wife spent to replace the things that was destroyed in the house,a whole lot of people have contacted me regarding the house but not just sure of who to accept due to the horrible experience we had with the last tenant so i am really taking my time to look for a very responsible person
that we can trust in as a tenant, all i want is a very responsible person that will take care of the house like his/her own and if you can assure me of the house will be in good hands, i will be happy to let you rent from me for as long as you wish.

Fill the rental application form below and send it back to me as soon as you can if you are really interested in renting the house.

title: Live Large in Little Portugal
description:
1BR / 1Ba 728ft2 available dec 1 condo w/d in unit no smoking/ 1br - 728ft2 -Who needs a single-family home when you've got main-floor access to your abode? Talk about convenience in the times of COVID. This amazing 1-bedroom + large den unit in Little Portugal boasts a safe and private entrance, allowing for entry without having to retreat into a corner every time someone walks by in a hallway, lobby, or accompanies you on an elevator. Just open the front door, enter straight into the privacy of your own home!

You need to see this place to believe it. Let's start with the generous-sized den that can operate as your new work-at-home space during these unprecedented times. Otherwise, use it as a second bedroom, workout area, dining room or extra storage space.

Eat in style in your gourmet gallery kitchen and relax with your bubble to your heart's content in the large living space. The spacious bedroom boasts a walk-in closet, and the en suite laundry offers the ultimate in convenience.

Make your way out onto the gorgeous private patio that will feel like you've got your own home in the ‘burbs with a backyard oasis. Gaze out into the private courtyard that's accessible only to VIPers - including you and a tiny handful of others on the ground floor.

As if the unit itself wasn't fabulous enough, the area is just as incredible. You'll be surrounded by awesome restaurants, bars, bodegas, galleries, groceries, corner stores, the TTC, and trendy spots along Dundas West, Roncesvalles, and Ossington.

Better get a move on and make your way over today!

Locker and parking included. No smokers or pets. Available December 1.

Virtual Tour: https://youtu.be/RS-Sixb_uwU

Kevin Yu
Broker of Record
Royal LePage Terrequity Kevin Yu Realty
www.kevinyuteam.com

**Now accepting in person tours!**

Our highly trained rental agents will ensure to maintain physical distancing, wear masks, and sanitize all frequently touched surfaces before and after showings.

To view our suites from the comfort of your own home, use the virtual tour links below:

1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=ZcX1Dw9Z6Q6

Proactive Measures:
Preston Living has always put the safety and comfort of our residents first. In addition to the daily cleaning and disinfecting our onsite staff perform in all common areas, we are now taking part in the Healthy Suite Program for an added level of protection for you and your family before you move-in! This involves:

• Entire suite is fogged with a Health Canada approved disinfectant: Bedrooms(s), Bathroom(s), Living Room, Closet(s), Kitchen
• Microbe shield treatment of the high-touch areas including: All Doorknobs & Handles, Light switches, Taps & Faucets, Kitchen Appliances, Entire Bathroom(s), Balcony/Terrace

Online Payments and Communications:
Our new online resident portal Building Stack is now available! Submit maintenance requests, access information about your building and your lease, make rent payments online via bank transfer, debit and credit, and communicate easily with your building's management team all from your personal device or computer.

About Preston Living:
Preston Living is among Toronto's most dedicated property management firms. We take exceptional pride in offering quality, well-maintained units for affordable prices. With over 60 years of history, Preston Living (formally known as Preston Apartments) can attribute our continued success to the fact that we provide desirable units and extraordinary customer service. Our ability to listen to and recognize the needs of the individuals who live in the properties we manage has enabled us to maintain an outstanding record of client retention.

We guarantee that your online rental application will be processed within 1 business day.

**Photos are to depict suite finishes, not actual suite as we have multiple suites available.

Visit us at PrestonLiving.ca.

title: 1 Bed Furnished/All Incl. Condo Danforth Village / Upper Beach avail.
description:
1BR / 1Ba 519ft2 available oct 1 furnished condo w/d in unit/ 1br - 519ft2 -Bright and beautiful 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo for rent within 1 minute walk to the Woodbine Subway station. Fully Equipped To Just Move In!

Gorgeous and modern condo has everything you need right at your doorstep! Modern fully furnished 1 bedroom condo for rent in Danforth Village / Upper Beach near Downtown! Located in and around Toronto's Hottest Neighbourhoods! Greek-Town, Beaches, Danforth, Leslieville.
A comfortable and stylish condo unit in a new 12 story boutique building located 1 minute walk to Woodbine Subway Station, minutes to downtown by subway or car. Everything you need is right at your doorstep! Steps to transit, banks, fruit market, grocery store, restaurants and café’s. Convenient ground-floor Firkin (Restaurant/Pub) featuring 'All day Breakfast'. There are nearby parks and Farmer’s Markets.

Extras: Incl:4 Stainless Appliances, Granite Countertop, Floor To Ceiling Windows, Juliet balcony 4th fl, Bright! Ensuite laundry, Large Wall to Wall Mirrored Bedroom Closet, high ceilings, Gym /Exercise Room. Elf's, A/C, Virtual Concierge, Media Room, Party/Meeting Room, use of BBQ, Security System, Visitor Parking, Auto Share. No Smoking. No parking but easily rented within building or street permit.

*Tenant provides letter of employment and proof of income, references and credit check including score with application.
*6-12 month lease options and tenant to obtain content insurance.
$2185/month or $2,285/month Incl. All Utilities.(Hydro, Gas, Water, High Speed Unlimited Internet)

-The Space-
-Fully Equipped To Just Move In-
A comfortable and stylish one bedroom condo unit, in a newly built building, just a 2 minute walk from the metro and steps away from the Toronto beaches. The condo unit is new and includes amenities such as a first floor lobby lounge area and a gym (even a hair dryer and an iron so that you can look polished while away from home) for an unforgettable stay. There is a separate bedroom with a queen bed, and a living space with a large comfortable sofa with removable cushions making it comfortable as an extra bed. The kitchen is fully equipped (toaster, Bodum coffee maker - with coffee supply, pots, pans etc.). There's a Park and Yoga studio, Restaurants, Pubs, Fruit Market, Train, Grocery store, Dollar Store, Banks, Hair Dresser and Consignment Clothing Shop steps away from the condo! - Private unit on the 4th floor of a bright and clean air-conditioned condo. The unit is laminate flooring, and equipped with a comfortable queen-sized bed, side table, closet and storage space. The condo includes; Linen, towels, a hair dryer, an iron/ironing board, high-speed WiFi, a Smart TV with TV apps and Netflix set up for guest users. - kitchen, bathroom, living room, outdoor green space patio. - Laundry within the unit

-The Neighbourhood-
The area is very safe and family friendly. It's so close to downtown, Greek Town, Little India, Danforth Village, and of course the Beach!! Woodbine beach is about a 20 minute walk or under & a 10 min bus ride. There are lots of great amenities around. There are banks on the corner, a grocery store across the street, farmer's market a block away, many pubs including an English pub which has great food located beside the condo. The Danforth/Beaches area which is a sought after spot of Toronto because it is close to the water, extremely safe and full of fantastic greenery and parks, yet you can be Downtown in minutes! It is an urban residential area which will make you feel like you are living the true Toronto lifestyle. In under 20 minute walk to The Beaches (prime boardwalk area for nature, exercise, walking trails, and relaxing at Woodbine Beach along the shores of Lake Ontario), to Leslieville (vintage shopping, restaurants, pubs, and indie coffee shops), 15 minute walk to Little India (authentic restaurants, festivals and culture), and Greek town (restaurants, pubs, shopping and one of the city's largest yearly festivals - Taste of the Danforth). - 2 min walk to Woodbine TTC subway station. - 15 min subway ride to downtown (Yonge and Bloor). - 15 min drive/20 minute subway ride to Dundas Square. - Overnight bus service is a 1 min walk. - Close to the DVP (Don Valley Parkway) and Gardiner Expressway/QEW - AutoShare and bike share are all close-by.

~What’s included:
- Large Smart TV (Netflix, Web browsing)
- Sectional sofa, with pillows
- Coffee table
- Kitchen Island
- Bar stools
- Décor (art)
- Queen bed
- Bed sheets + towels
- Eating/cooking utensils +knives + cutting board + pots + pans, cups, plates, bowls,
🛏 1⠀
🛁 1⠀
📍 Danforth & Woodbine⁠
2055 Danforth Avenue, Toronto, ON M4C 1J8, Canada
Now Available

title: 2 bdrom/1 bath in beautiful Riverdale
description:
2BR / 1Ba 900ft2 available now cats are OK - purrr dogs are OK - wooof apartment w/d in unit no parking/ 2br - 900ft2 -Welcome to Riverdale. This is a two bedroom, one bathroom apartment in a completely renovated, 110 year old house. This cosy space with its high ceilings and modern look is ready for you to enjoy.

The space is a bright 2 bedroom, with one bathroom. It occupies the main and upper (two floors) of a centennial semi-detached house with a modern renovation....a charming mix of old and new. Its well lit, with large windows in every room. The kitchen has beautiful quartz countertops, stainless appliances with a ice maker in the freezer, and a coffee maker along with a coffee maker for your morning cup. Upstairs there are two bedrooms, both of which have ceiling fans and ample closet space (one of which is cedar lined). The full bathroom is on the second floor. There is a lovely bench seat outside with which you can sit and enjoy the wonderful neighbourhood.

The apartment is right near Broadview Subway Station, street cars and cycling. If you are a driver, we are very close to the DVP, but its so quiet, you wouldn’t know it. A minute or two's walk down the tree lined street will get you to restaurants, shops, grocery store, the Danforth Music Hall and both Riverdale and Withrow parks!

title: 1 br, 1 bath near Ryerson University
description:
1BR / 1Ba 600ft2 available now cats are OK - purrr dogs are OK - wooof condo w/d in unit no smoking no parking/ 1br - 600ft2 -Come live in one of the most unique spaces in Toronto. A heritage building, the Merchandise lofts was built in 1916 and was used originally as a Simpson’s department store warehouse.

Common Spaces:
With the origins are historic, the modern upgrades make it comfortable to live in. The Lofts boast open areas to enjoy and relax, an elevator to get to you unit, and energy efficient windows to help with the carbon footprint.
A concierge is available for your convenience. The main floor hosts a gym with a sauna, exercise and yoga room, indoor half basketball court and a games room. On the rooftop, there is a garden and deck, barbecue, dog space, party and meeting room and pool. Although not connected with this unit, underground parking can be rented if you need.

The Unit:
The unit is a cosy one bedroom, one bathroom space with 13’ ceilings. With air conditioning, a dishwasher and laundry, the space is very comfortable indeed. The open concept living dining area has hardwood floors and overhead exposed ductwork. This is one of a few units in the building that has large patio doors leading to a balcony that opens onto an inner atrium. French doors lead to a bedroom who’s unique design allows for a large walk in closet. A bathroom with a separate shower completes the space.

The Neighbourhood
The Merchandise Lofts is located next door to Ryerson University in the City Centre neighbourhood. Residents benefit from the Metro grocery store directly below the loft. Another great shopping option is the massive Loblaws at College and Yonge.
The building is surrounded by green spaces to explore, from Allen Gardens to Ryerson Community Park to St. James Park, and more.
The Eaton Centre, the Village and so many spaces on Dundas, Queen and Yonge Street where bars, restaurants, and independent shops are waiting to be explored.

Transportation
Streetcars along Dundas and Queen Streets are great east-west options for those relying on public transit to get around. Dundas Station subway station is a few minutes walk to head north or south. Union station is three stops away, allowing for Via trains, Go busses and the UP to Pearson International Airport. For residents on two wheels, bike lanes also line Jarvis and Gerrard Streets for travel in all four directions.

Move in date is flexible!! And video is available upon request!!

4 min walk to Pape Subway Station, and then five subway stops (or 7 more min) to Yonge and Bloor!

This newly renovated reasonably priced main floor and basement unit with 3 bedrooms is just steps to Pape subway station, and in the heart of Greek Town and The Danforth! Not only does the location offer easy commuting for work, school and entertainment, but the space offers your own additional 450 sq ft private backyard in the city. The master bedroom is spacious with its own walk-in closet, and the other two bedrooms each have one closet space as well (one large and one small). In addition, the space has new in-suite laundry and shared additional storage. The kitchen has been fully renovated with full-size stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. In the kitchen, there is space for a dining table, and has patio doors which lead out to a large covered deck, back patio and garden. ALL utilities included (heat, A/C, water and electricity/hydro).

Perfect for a family or friends! The district boosts great schools for elementary, high school and one college, and the 4 min walk to Pape subway offers a quick commute to employment or other education!

Although there is great restaurants, coffee shop, bakery, aesthetician, dry cleaning and more only a minute walk away, you are also only five minutes from The Danforth, which has restaurants, shopping, gyms, groceries and more galore!
